item.description:
NOTE: DUE TO THE HOLIDAY, THIS MEETUP WILL BE ON THURSDAY 9/9, NOT OUR NORMAL 1st WED OF THE MONTH.

Come meet like-minded adventure travelers who are interested in exploring exciting and off-the-beaten-path destinations around the world. Share stories of past adventures and talk about future ones! Among many things, we usually discuss actual up-coming club group tours, as well as trips that members have taken, would like to take or dream of taking. We typically have 10 - 20 people show at our meetups!

It doesn't matter whether you are a solo traveler, a couple or just friends; everyone is welcome. Please contact me if you'd like to attend so I can be sure to keep an eye out for you. Email Kevin

We try to meet at the high tables immediately on the left as you enter the Page Bar (172 Hanover St Portsmouth)... just ask for Kevin.
item.how_to_find_us: We try to meet at the high tables immediately on the left as you enter the Page.
item.name: NH/Seacoast International Adventure Travel Club September Meetup
